title: NaviCompass Wear
summary: Simple Compass+Navigation System on Android Wear
description: ★★You can use this app even if your wearable device do not have gps chips.!- Set up a shortcut to the desired destination on the map, and let's find the place through my wearable equipment.- Setting the destination in the app. - Then the direction and remaining distance to that location will be displayed on wearable devices.★ Useful for these circumstance.1. When you go to an appointment place.2. When measuring the distance from the destination3. When you want to know the distance to the destination and direction at the same time.
descriptionHTML:
★★You can use this app even if your wearable device do not have gps chips.!

- Set up a shortcut to the desired destination on the map, and let's find the place through my wearable equipment.
- Setting the destination in the app.
- Then the direction and remaining distance to that location will be displayed on wearable devices.

★ Useful for these circumstance.
1. When you go to an appointment place.
2. When measuring the distance from the destination
3. When you want to know the distance to the destination and direction at the same time.
